channel.title: Hilary Duff on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hilary Duff Plots Return to Music, Signs Record Deal With Atlantic
item.description: Duff’s musical comeback will be chronicled with a docuseries from Sam Wrench, whose credits include ‘Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour’ and ‘A No Nonsense Christmas with Sabrina Carpenter.’

item.title: Hilary Duff to Star in Hulu Comedy Series ‘Pretty Ugly,’ Set in the World of Child Beauty Pageants
item.description: Hilary Duff will star in a single-camera comedy series at Hulu titled “Pretty Ugly.” The show is based on Kirker Butler’s 2015 novel of the same name, and it hails from director Silv
